Symmol
------

Description: 
   Program to find symmetry of a molecule 

Reference: 
   Symmol: T. Pilati and A. Forni, *SYMMOL: a program to find the maximum symmetry group in an atom cluster, given a prefixed tolerance*,  `Journal of Applied Crystallography 31, 503 (1998) <https://doi.org/10.1107/S0021889898002180>`__ 

License:
    Symmol is provided under the standard ADF license terms.
